thread.section_title: Lanzerac Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Love this place
thread.title_full: Love this place - Review of Lanzerac Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: david h
title: Love this place
text:
This was our second visit. Recently bought and refurbished. It is beginning to be stunning throughout. Food and wine out of this world. Service exemplary.
A little dissapointed with the wine tasting because of lack of staff. Admittedly this could be because of a large wine event a few days before. Rooms stunning. Also very good value.
